tool_description: PDF utilities, features include: conversion from HTML writing text and images on PDFs, merging two or more files, size compression
name: PDF utilities
title: PDF utilities

api_list.name: Main endpoint
api_list.description: Main endpoint to do all operations. Please refer to "Tutorials" page for usage samples.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pdf-utilities1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pdf-utilities1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
